K10n266u_001:8: ekasmin samaye bhagavān buddhaḥ sāgaranāgarājāvasathe viharati sma sārddhaṃ sārdhadvādaśaśatabhikṣūṇāṃ mahāsaṃghena bahubhiśca bodhisattvamahāsattvaiḥ
K10n266u_001:10: caturṇāṃ dharmoddānānāmabhidhāne kriyamāṇe tadabhidhānena caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇāmabhidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati |
K10n266u_001:12: sarveṣāṃ saṃskārāṇām anityatāyāṃ bodhisattvānaṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nirdiṣṭamakṣayajñānaṃ pravartate |
K10n266u_001:13: sarveṣāṃ sāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ duḥkhatāyāṃ bodhisattvānaṃ mahāsattvānāṃ rnirdiṣṭamakṣayajñānaṃ pravartate |
K10n266u_001:14: sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇām anātmatāyāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nirdiṣṭamakṣayajñānaṃ pravartate |
K10n266u_001:17: eteṣāṃ caturṇāṃ dharmoddānānāmabhidhāne kriyamāṇe tadabhidhānena caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇāmabhidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati |
K10n266u_001:19: āttamanaso bhikṣavaḥ sarve ca bodhisattvā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti |
K10n266u_001:21: bhāratīyopādhyāyena surendrabodhinā mahālocāvā-vandejñānasenena cedamanūditaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ ca |
